amendment.description: To require the Under Secretary of Transportation for Transportation Security to assist in the coordination of the voluntary provision of emergency services during commercial flights.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4592 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4592 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7494-7496; text: CR S7494) To require the Under Secretary of Transportation for Transportation Security to assist in the coordination of the voluntary provision of emergency services during commercial flights.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4592 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4592 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Feingold.
